game.name: My Darkest Witch
game.shortDescription: 내 가장 어두운 마녀는 당신이,빛의 질서의 마법사로,전염병에서 땅을 정화하려고,이단 괴물의 무리에 맞서 싸울 생존 경기장입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: My Darkest Witch is a survival arena where you, as a mage of the Order of Light, fight against hordes of heretical monsters, trying to cleanse the land from the plague.

reviewHighlights.text: best runs/all skills unlocked here: https://youtu.be/GuT9gcmXxIE Overall this is a fun game for 59 cents and is way more challenging then it looks it...
You are alone. You are in the field. Lots of monsters. We must survive. Very difficult. Very scary. No one knows where they came from and what they ne...
